diagram:
@startuml
participant Patient as "Patient"
participant ClinicSystem as "Clinic System"
participant Doctor as "Doctor"
participant Scheduler as "Scheduler"
Patient ->> ClinicSystem : Request Appointment
ClinicSystem ->> Scheduler : Get Available Time Slots
Scheduler ->> ClinicSystem : Return Time Slots
ClinicSystem ->> Patient : Display Time Slots
alt Patient Selects Time Slot
    Patient ->> ClinicSystem : Select Time Slot
    ClinicSystem ->> Doctor : Notify Doctor of New Appointment
    Doctor ->> ClinicSystem : Confirm Appointment
    ClinicSystem ->> Patient : Confirm Appointment
else Patient Cancels
    Patient ->> ClinicSystem : Cancel Request
    ClinicSystem ->> Scheduler : Update Availability
    Scheduler ->> ClinicSystem : Return Updated Time Slots
    ClinicSystem ->> Patient : Display Updated Time Slots
end
opt Reschedule Appointment
    Patient ->> ClinicSystem : Request Reschedule
    ClinicSystem ->> Scheduler : Get Available Time Slots
    Scheduler ->> ClinicSystem : Return Time Slots
    ClinicSystem ->> Patient : Display Time Slots
    Patient ->> ClinicSystem : Select New Time Slot
    ClinicSystem ->> Doctor : Update Appointment
    Doctor ->> ClinicSystem : Confirm Update
    ClinicSystem ->> Patient : Confirm Update
end
loop Check Appointment Status
    Patient ->> ClinicSystem : Check Appointment Status
    ClinicSystem ->> Patient : Return Appointment Status
end
@enduml
